resources.string:
Quizzzed is a simple multiplayer Quiz Game.
The player who wants to start the game can generate a fun secret code by clicking on the Start a Game button. All one has to do is to tell that code to the fellow players. Others who want to join the game have to select the Join a Game button and enter the code told to them.
When the Joined Players list starts showing other Players, the Game Master can select the Match Length from the three available options:
10 Questions: 90 Seconds
20 Questions: 3 Minutes
30 Questions: 5 Minutes
Once everyone has joined, the Game Master can click onto the Start Game button and the Quiz starts.
Each Correct Answer earns you 5 coins.
